Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 14 Saraṇaduka, Tika » 14.17 Saraṇaduka, Uppannattika » 14.17.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Saraṇaduka, Tika
Saraṇaduka, Uppannattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
58.
2724Saraṇo uppanno dhammo saraṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo uppanno dhammo saraṇassa uppannassa ca araṇassa uppannassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
2725Araṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
2726Araṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
59.
2727Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi…pe…  avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
